labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The file doesn't upload, and either results in the message not sending. If you added a comment to the upload, only the comment will be sent.
data.short_description: It is impossible to retry a file upload if it fails.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a file upload fail for whatever reason. (I exceeded the message sending limit to reproduce.) - When the "Upload Failed" modal appears, click "Click here to retry the upload."
